upgrade.0: When the equipping character does not have an Arkhe: When Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, or Plunging Attacks strike, a Pneuma or Ousia energy blast will be unleashed, dealing 160% of ATK as DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 12s. The energy blast type is determined by the current type of the Sword of Narzissenkreuz.
upgrade.1: When the equipping character does not have an Arkhe: When Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, or Plunging Attacks strike, a Pneuma or Ousia energy blast will be unleashed, dealing 200% of ATK as DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 12s. The energy blast type is determined by the current type of the Sword of Narzissenkreuz.

This effect can be triggered once every 12s. The energy blast type is determined by the current type of the Sword of Narzissenkreuz.

This effect can be triggered once every 12s. The energy blast type is determined by the current type of the Sword of Narzissenkreuz.
upgrade.4: When the equipping character does not have an Arkhe: When Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, or Plunging Attacks strike, a Pneuma or Ousia energy blast will be unleashed, dealing 320% of ATK as DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 12s. The energy blast type is determined by the current type of the Sword of Narzissenkreuz.

upgrade.0: 装备者不具备「始基力」时：普通攻击、重击、下落攻击命中时，会释放芒性或荒性的能量冲击，造成160%攻击力的伤害。该效果每12秒至多触发一次，能量冲击的类型由水仙十字之剑当前的属性决定。

upgrade.0: 装備者が「アルケー」を持っていない時、通常攻撃、重撃、落下攻撃が命中すると、プネウマ、またはウーシアのエネルギー衝撃を放ち、攻撃力160%分のダメージを与える。この効果は12秒毎に1回のみ発動可能。エネルギー衝撃の種類は水仙十字の剣の現在の属性によって決まる。JP0B
